00022 #define SQR(x) (x)*(x)
00023 
00024 void moveGaussian(Gaussian* g, double d[3])
00025 {
00026   int i;
00027 
00028   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00029     g->b[i] += d[i];
00030 }

00032 
00033 void boostGaussian(Gaussian* g, double v[3])
00034 {
00035   int i;
00036 
00037   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00038     g->chi[i] *= cexp(I*mass(g->xi)*(v[0]*g->b[0]+v[1]*g->b[1]+v[2]*g->b[2])
00039                       -0.5*g->a*SQR(mass(g->xi))*(SQR(v[0])+SQR(v[1])+SQR(v[2])));
00040   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00041     g->b[i] += I*mass(g->xi)*g->a*v[i];
00042 
00043 }

00046 void rotateGaussian(Gaussian* G, 
00047                     const double R3[3][3], const complex double R2[2][2])
00048 {
00049   cm2mult(R2, G->chi);
00050   m3mult(R3, G->b);
00051 }

00054 void invertGaussian(Gaussian* G)
00055 {
00056   int i;
00057 
00058   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00059     G->b[i] *= -1;
00060 }

00063 void timerevertGaussian(Gaussian* G)
00064 {
00065   int i;
00066 
00067   G->a = conj(G->a);
00068   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00069     G->b[i] = conj(G->b[i]);
00070 
00071   complex double tmp = G->chi[0];
00072   G->chi[0] = -conj(G->chi[1]);
00073   G->chi[1] = conj(tmp);
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 void scaleGaussian(Gaussian* G, double kappa)
00078 {
00079   int i;
00080 
00081   G->a *= kappa*kappa;   
00082   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00083     G->b[i] *= kappa;
00084 }

00087 void spinflipGaussian(Gaussian* G)
00088 {
00089   complex double c;
00090   c = G->chi[0];
00091   G->chi[0] = conj(G->chi[1]);
00092   G->chi[1] = -conj(c);
00093 }

00096 void calcGaussianAux(const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, GaussianAux* X)
00097 {
00098   int i;
00099 
00100   X->sig[0] = conj(G1->chi[0])*G2->chi[1] + conj(G1->chi[1])*G2->chi[0];
00101   X->sig[1] = I*(conj(G1->chi[1])*G2->chi[0] - conj(G1->chi[0])*G2->chi[1]);
00102   X->sig[2] = conj(G1->chi[0])*G2->chi[0] - conj(G1->chi[1])*G2->chi[1];
00103 
00104   X->lambda = 1.0/(conj(G1->a)+G2->a);
00105   X->alpha = conj(G1->a)*G2->a*X->lambda;
00106   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00107     X->rho[i] = X->lambda*(G2->a*conj(G1->b[i])+conj(G1->a)*G2->b[i]);
00108   X->rho2 = cvec3sqr(X->rho);
00109   for (i=0; i<3; i++)   
00110     X->pi[i] = X->lambda*I*(conj(G1->b[i]) - G2->b[i]);
00111   X->pi2 = cvec3sqr(X->pi);
00112   X->rhopi = cvec3mult(X->rho, X->pi);
00113   cvec3cross(X->rho, X->pi, X->rhoxpi);
00114 
00115   X->T = (1+G1->xi*G2->xi)/2;
00116   X->S = conj(G1->chi[0])*G2->chi[0] + conj(G1->chi[1])*G2->chi[1];
00117   X->R = cpow32(2*M_PI*X->alpha)*cexp(0.5*X->pi2/X->lambda);
00118   X->Q = X->T*X->S*X->R;
00119 }
